The paper says that the ongoing legal, journalistic and parliamentary investigations into phone hacking at the News of the World will continue to raise questions about David Cameron 's judgment. There will be people hoping that Andy Coulson 's departure will be an end to the matter, but of course it isn't. There are too many unanswered questions about too many important people, companies and institutions...[ This] suggests that David Cameron 's lack of judgment over Andy Coulson is even more striking. uncomfortable questions remain for the prime minister.
